title: Can you get perma banned for leaver busters
body:
just wondering if you can get perma banned for leaver busters

I keep dcing from games for 2-5 mins bc my pc bluescreens due to it being on a hard drive, i dont really have the funds to buy a new ssd atm and ive had about 4 leavers (20 mins queues) can i get banned

replies.body: If you're leaving a lot of ranked games then you may face further punishment, but otherwise you'll just keep getting longer Leaver Busters (caps at 20 mins) when you leave.
but what kind of further punishments do you mean? me scared

You may face suspensions on your account, but 4 isn't a lot of leaves. 

That being said, I'd still stick to normals if you're having computer issues. Would you like to queue into a ranked game just to have someone leave halfway through and lose you the game? Would it not make you more frustrated to know that they are aware of the issue and it's happened before, but they continued to play ranked anyway?
